|stockos = Linux;2.6.36;; |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = Micro USB |serial = yes,, 4-pin header |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.31.1 |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = Xiaomi_XXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^Xiaomi_[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 2015 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== [http://bigota.miwifi.com/xiaoqiang/rom/r1cl/miwifi_r1cl_firmware_82b5c_2.7.81.bin Dev FW] ===Specifications=== :;[https://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:62648:3672#3672 Short Description] 
Xiaomi Mi Wi-Fi Nano Router (Youth Version)
Category: Routers; Application: SOHO
CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7628NN @580MHz WiSoC
Flash: [[Winbond]] W25Q128FV - 16MB (SPI)
RAM: [[Winbond]] W9751G6KB - 64MB (DDR2)
Protocol Standards: 802.11bgn
Wi-Fi Supported Frequency: 2.4GHz
Wi-Fi Transmission Rate: 300Mbps
Antenna: 2x External PCB antenna
WAN Ports: 1 FE (100Mbps)
LAN Ports: 2 FE (100Mbps)
Wired Transfer Rate: 100Mbps
Max. LAN Data Rate: 100Mbps
Number of USB Interfaces: 1x
With Modem Function: No
Built-in Firewall: No
Supports WDS: No
Supports WPS: No
Supports VPN: No
Package Size: 200 x 100 x 50 mm
Gross Weight/Package: 300 g
